summary: Vanilla Followers. Strong, Hardy and Tall, Essential men of Gaul.
descriptionHtml:
I like to roleplay with the Imperial Legion resembling Rome and the Stormcloaks as the Gauls/Germanics. They are influenced by the show Spartacus and the book "The Forgotten Legion" for their appearance and gear.

They Will be in The Dead Mans Drink in Falkreath

They are completely vanilla, basic followers.
To Install Drag and Drop ESP file into Data Folder.

Mods you can see in the screenshots are DSpSOB (Dual Sheathing and Shields on back), LIAT (lively inns and taverns), Jaysus' Swords, Equipping Overhaul and Lost LongSwords which you can find all of them on the Nexus.
author: Dest45

files.name: Brothers From Gaul
files.changelogHtml: Fixed Gray face, added complexion and set skin interpolation to "0"
